reference_summary:
Getting Into the Vortex: The Law of Attraction in Action, Episode XII
Esther Hicks  (Actor),     Jerry Hicks  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD-ROM  This title is manufactured on demand using DVD-R, when sold by Amazon.com.  Learn more   What's this?
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
['Product Description', '2-DVD set', "“You didn’t come to ‘get it done'. You came for the thrill of the ride.”", 'New questions on\xa0: staying positive around a negative friend, why bad things can happen when you’re feeling good, death\xa0- of\xa0- a\xa0- child issues, she’s lost her trust in men, why are we all here, do we ultimately pay for harming others? And – how to hear your own Inner Voice!', 'Plus: Abraham issues a call-out to society:\xa0 “To the leaders of your world, to the leaders of your organizations, to the doctors and scientists and psychologists and psychiatrists, to the teachers… to anyone who wants to help anyone…”\xa0– Abraham delivers!', 'About the Actor', 'All your power is in your Now. And what Now is the reason that Now is Now its whole power and potential is that Now is where you meet You. It is where the vibration of your current offering and the vibration of You, meet. And your emotions tell you how the meeting is going.\xa0 For tons of free material along with the latest books, CDs,\xa0and DVDs, visit their website.']

Great I loved it.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong passion for self-help and personal development, with a focus on positive thinking and the Law of Attraction. Their appreciation for classic cinema remains significant, as they watch films showcasing compelling narratives and strong performances. Recent explorations into atmospheric science fiction and horror reflect a broadening of interests, highlighting their ongoing fascination with storytelling that resonates emotionally.

Their affinity for older films continues, evidenced by recent reviews that demonstrate a balanced enjoyment of both classic and lighter fare, such as murder mysteries, while upholding their standards for effective storytelling. This dynamic reveals a blend of nostalgia and curiosity in their cinematic journey, showcasing an evolving taste that intertwines cherished memories with fresh experiences.

The user actively engages in community-oriented resource sharing, emphasizing spiritual growth and mindfulness, and consistently seeks content that aligns with their holistic approach to emotional wellness. Their perspective on films—ranging from classic to contemporary—illustrates a commitment to quality storytelling that underpins their self-discovery and personal growth journey.

Overall, the user’s exploration of diverse genres enriches their life experience, reinforcing their dedication to content that supports and enhances their ongoing pursuit of personal development and emotional resonance.
